name: outpouring
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an expression of strong feeling that is difficult to control: His death at the age of 35 has occasioned an outpouring of grief.
mainly humorous a very large number of things produced at the same time: Last year saw an outpouring of cookery books.

Masses and large amounts of things
Add to word list
Add to word list
something that flows out in large amounts or with strong force, esp. emotion: an outpouring of love/sympathy
